website_summaries.verdict: The OM-D E-M10 Mark II is another solid mirrorless camera from Olympus thanks to 5-axis stabilization and a great EVF, but it's missing 4K video.
cons: Accurate tracking requires slower burst rate

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight system camera gives great results
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for travel photography. Greta photographs superb image stabilisation, great lenses looks fantastic and so light. The menu system though is very annoying, not nearly as good as Nikon for example and difficult to use and the focussing isn't very good either at selecting the most likely subject and the selected area often moves. Controls are good but a bit fiddly for bigger hands.
customer_reviews.author: Smiller

customer_reviews.title: Renowned Brand
customer_reviews.text: My first camera was a OM 40, back in 1980. This model is smaller than that body. It feels well made and sits nicely in the hand. This is a very good camera, image quality from the 14-42 lens is very good. Features of the camera are superb, the 40-150 lens is the best ive I've seen in micro four thirds beating the lumix equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: G P Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera but camera freezes if used for long period
customer_reviews.text: Good size, and excellent picture quality if slightly over saturated. Big problem is that the camera freezes when used for an extended period. The viewfinder shows no image or information and turning camera on and off does not help. The only way to unfreeze the camera is to eject the battery and restart the camera. Menu is complex but once you have set the camera up you rarely need to use this. Electronic view finder takes some getting used too and is slower than conventional SLR. LCD tends to reduce batteyr life significantly. Misses some useful features common with Nikons, e.g. ability to create picture folders, hide pictures, and selection of min/max ISO speed.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful camera. Small and light you can keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful camera. Small and light you can keep it in your pocket. Makes you want to go out and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: George V

customer_reviews.title: Simple and straightforward even for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled! The camera is a sheer delight and I’m delighted that I bought. It takes me back to the Olympus film camera. Everything about it is simple and straight forward. If you want a camera where you don’t have to worry about settings and all the jargon before you can take pictures. Then this is it. Highly recommended even for the beginner. Not complicated at all. Great camera and well worth the investment. So a must to buy, and it looks good as well, especially in silver.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I have this paired with a Lumix 12-32 ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have this paired with a Lumix 12-32 lens and can carry this cupped in the palm of my hand with just a wrist strap attached for security. Easy and light to carry around, great quality of photos & video for the size/price.
customer_reviews.author: DaveEP

customer_reviews.title: Great intro into mirrorless camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great, bought to try photography would reccomend to other people, lots of features some that im still trying to understand. Learnt the basics through youtube accompanied with this camera, photos look really sharp, not the best camera in low light features arent defined very well. Lots of different features and works wonders on iauto and other easy to use modes
customer_reviews.author: Chidera Okeke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I was really sad when my old Olympus packed up, but am totally delighted with this. I've only had it a few days so can't really assess the details, but it was so straightforward to get started and I look forward to learning what I will be able to do with it. One really special thing about it is its lovely neat size, compared to the bulk of the old one. I bought a grip to help hold it when the bigger lenses are in use, and very happy with that too. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera, bought used for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera! Traded up from a trusty EPL-1 Pen. Packed full of pro features. Menus are a little daunting at first but there's loads of YouTube tutorials to help you (they're better than the Olympus online offerings). Great choice of lenses from macro to panorama. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sleepa

customer_reviews.title: Good system and light and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very good all round level entry camra, ups I dropped it resently but very sturdy no damage. Only issue so far the tracking system isn't that good dosenet lock onto the subject so they need to Inprove the system please. Otherwise good compact quality camera. We'll done olympus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Olmypus OM-D E-10 Mk11 body
customer_reviews.text: Excellent neat body full of useful features. Very pleased with Camera. Thankyou Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Olympus OMD E M 10 mark 2
customer_reviews.text: This was bought recently from the Amazon site , it is really a great product , I have been very surprised with the many photographic features it has .

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lightweight quality camera when I did not want to carry my Canon 7D. This is perfect and results have been exception. Good Street camera.

customer_reviews.title: ... gave 5 stars cause it focus faster and it's easy to use but the menu system just drive me ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars cause it focus faster and it's easy to use but the menu system just drive me crazy, i come from fuji where everything is "at hand" and i'll come back there...even if compared to olympus the AF mechanism really sucks
customer_reviews.author: fabrizio Motta

customer_reviews.title: Great camera body
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera body. Small enough to fit in a pocket, huge range of lenses available, and so many features!

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cameras I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Recently switched from Nikon 7100 to EM10 mii mainly to reduce the size of my system. So glad I've switched. It's packed with features and bargain at £499 with two kits lens. Loving every photo I take with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ozturk Aker

customer_reviews.title: My favourite walkabout camera
customer_reviews.text: My favourite walkabout camera. It's well-built and light but has a reasonable 'heft'. Great functionality, but you have to get used to the Olympus menu system. I generally use it with an Olympus 17mm 1.8 lens.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera it’s really easy to use and the picture quality is brilliant.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work ok, not yet used fully but ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok,not yet used fully but could not find anywhere to match price.

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's gorgeous and I love it. Brilliant price through Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: NO NECK STRAP
customer_reviews.text: So I received this camera today but can't seem to find a neck strap for it. There is a black box which looks like it has a strap in there but it's just empty.
customer_reviews.author: Liudvik

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for my wife
customer_reviews.text: She is a very good photographer. Learned on on old school SLR and loves this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Herringbone

customer_reviews.title: The camera is of retro sturdy design, but the up to date extras (touch ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced quality camera to take on my travels and which wouldn't need an extra bag to carry around the world. This camera does both these things and much much more. The camera is of retro sturdy design, but the up to date extras (touch screen which can be used to auto focus at desired point, straight to device wifi, and adjustable screen) make this an awesome future proof camera. I am a beginner photographer myself, but the picture quality is brilliant and I have recommended this camera to every traveller I have met so far. I cannot wait to buy some more lenses for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little camera
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little camera. Could be smaller, but...I wanted EVF and I got it. Only flaw I see is...a dust in brand new 14-42mm EZ lens. Now is time to buy new lenses, 1 portrait for sure and I am thinking about second tele besides my 40-150mm kit and 14-150 2.8 pro...hard choice...
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my new camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new camera. It is extremely compact and easy to carry around especially when paired with the pancake zoom which closes almost flat. The quality of the images is oustanding,
customer_reviews.author: PaulSurrey

customer_reviews.title: great image quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, great image quality, awesome metal body, not too big or heavy (bit smaller than a Olympus Om-10) and even a very nice viewfinder! About the look? Remember me about my Olympus OM10 film camera and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated camera. Superb photographs every time.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, which takes superb quality photos. Love the way the camera can take interchangeable lens. Highly rated camera.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful camera. I love it. It is producing excellent results.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use would recommend the camera to

customer_reviews.text: So far the best I had! I can't wait to learn more!

customer_reviews.text: I love it! With an adapter I can use all my old fine Minolta MD analog lenses using A-mode with manual focus, better as I ever had with my old Minolta X700 camera.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Compact and lightweight. Perfect for what I need when camping and travelling.

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful gives great photos and easy to take around
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful gives great photos and easy to take around. Very complicated to get to grip with all the functions and the website isn't the easiest to navigate.

customer_reviews.text: Light. Small. Speedy delivery. 2 years and 6 months warranty.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Medium sized Camera. Easy to use and great photos
customer_reviews.author: Ian Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Great for experienced photographers who don't want to carry a DSLR
customer_reviews.text: The image stabilisation system is built into the body of the camera, rather than the lenses. This means that the lenses are smaller, lighter and cheaper without sacrificing image stabilisation. This allows you to shoot at slower shutter speeds which dramatically improves image quality. The MFT lenses tend to be very good and cover a wide range of applications. The 40-100mm lens weighs nothing, but is surprisingly sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, just one thing...
customer_reviews.text: The end result is near identical to the more expensive EM5 II, I went for this model having owned the EM1, EM5, EM5 II and original EM10. The lighter weight is welcomed, all the features I need are there - but I have no love for the EVF, which renders a totally different colour and contrast to all other OMDs. I now use the LCD exclusively as this little issue is a pain for me. Otherwise a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: He takes much better photos with it than previously and actually uses some ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband - at his request after a lot of research on his part. He says he loves it, it is exactly what he wanted and he hoped it would be. He takes much better photos with it than previously and actually uses some of the settings already. He hasn't been able to come up with anything to grumble about so this must be one amazing camera. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lenton

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this camera. Ticks all my boxes at a good price. I am still getting used to it and have yet to take it on holiday. I can't wait, for the holiday and to get using this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Olympus OM-D E-M10 Mark II Kit, Micro Four Thirds System Camera (16 Megapixel, 5-Axis Image Stabilisation, Electronic Viewfinder) + M.Zuiko 14-42 mm EZ Zoom Lens, Silver
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Sillver| Style Name:14-42 EZ LensExperience a new level of creative photography. The exceptionally compact E‑M10 Mark II is a true expression of style ‑ paying homage to the original renowned OM‑1 with its classic design and metal body build quality. Yet it is entirely up to date with the latest technologies such as powerful 5‑Axis Image Stabilisation, which gives you spectacularly pin‑sharp images in any shooting situation. In addition to compatibility with a wide range of Micro Four Thirds system lenses, this OM‑D also features built‑in Wi‑Fi to give you the power to be more creative. Place the E‑M10 Mark II wherever you like and use your smartphone to control settings and shoot. Then share your images in an instant via OI.Share software and your smartphone.

BOX CONTAINS
Body, USB cable,Olympus Viewer 3 (CD-ROM), instruction manual, warranty card, BLS-50 Li-ion battery , BCS-5 Li-ion battery charger , 14-42 EZ Lens
feature_bullets: 5-axis image stabilisation - provides a razor-sharp image and compensates for all types of camera movement
Highest mobility thanks to low weight and compact design and a wide range of high-quality lenses
Ideal processing and high-quality metal housing
Easy connectivity with built-in WLAN - share precious moments on the spot with friends and family
Crystal-clear display thanks to electronic OLED viewfinder with 2.36 million points - even easier selection of image section plus checking of all settings in real time
Innovative dust removal system through silent Super Sonic Wave Filter
Outstanding image quality with pin-sharp images up to the edges of the image

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
